column4: i thought there was a wiki page or something about windows xp after the installation of linux
some process through the live cd and reconfiguring grub and the boot record
i just don't understand why windows has to be a bitch like this
it's liek "no, i won't boot or install if I'm number 1 biotch"
maybe unplug ubuntu, plug in the 30gb and install windows, then replug everything in?
with the right grub options - yu can 'swap' the drives and other things.  but it depends on your exact problem.
winxp won't install cause ubuntu is there :)
think of it as a sign.... :P
you really should put XP on the drive that will be hda.  for the best.
then you forget.. and go... DOH!!!
